parameters.name: Description
parameters.description:
The description of the flow log.

The description must be 1 to 256 characters in length, and cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: FlowLogId
parameters.description: The ID of the flow log.

parameters.name: FlowLogName
parameters.description:
The name of the flow log.

The name must be 1 to 128 characters in length, and cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: LogStoreName
parameters.description: The Logstore that stores the captured traffic data.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: **50**. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: ProjectName
parameters.description: The project that manages the captured traffic data.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the flow log.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the flow log belongs.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource from which traffic is captured.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of resource from which traffic is captured. Valid values:

*   **NetworkInterface**: elastic network interface (ENI)
*   **VSwitch**: all ENIs in a vSwitch
*   **VPC**: all ENIs in a virtual private cloud (VPC)

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the flow log. Valid values:

*   **Active**
*   **Activating**
*   **Inactive**

parameters.name: TrafficType
parameters.description:
The type of traffic that is captured. Valid values:

*   **All**: all traffic
*   **Allow**: traffic that is allowed by access control
*   **Drop**: traffic that is denied by access control

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the VPC to which the flow log belongs.
